comment:
TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!
Some weeks are work-heavy, but usually only a discussion post or a story map. Every time I emailed Professor McDaniel he got back to me within the same hour. The easiest professor ever, is not a tough grader but provides good feedback on assignments so you know how to improve

Probably the easiest online class I have ever taken. There are a few discussions (he is a very easy grader) as well as 2 tests and multiple quizzes. He has all of his lectures posted and uses the textbook.

Take him! This professor saved my HOPE Scholarship! I wasn't his #1 student in his online summer class lol, but he was eager to make sure that he was going to assist me to pass his geography class with a great grade! However, I spoke to him about it. If you were to ask him how to get a nice grade in his class, he will be more than glad to help you!

took his class online in the summer and enjoyed it. He is knowledgeable and passionate about what he teaches. Class was watching lectures, occasional discussion posts, and tests. Reading the textbook was also important. At first I was worried about the workload, but it's a doable summer class even if you're busy working or taking other classes.

Paul McDaniel is clearly the greatest man to ever work in the field of geography. If I could have him for every class I would easily do that in a heartbeat. He's a professor that cares deeply about what he's teaching, as well as cares about the students he teaches. If you want an easy A, this is it. His class is easy, fun, and it taught me much!

Mcdaniel was a a very nice and organized guy. The entire semester was laid out from day one. His lectures are pretty boring but you don't really need to listen to them, all the test and quizzes come directly from the textbook, word for word. You also have a few discussion posts, but other than that an easy A.
Professor McDaniel is very easy going. His classes were a bit boring, however, he is very knowledgable and nice.

I think classes like these in general are a waste of time if they are not related to your major. Although since I was required to take this class, hands down easiest class I've taken at the university. As long as you do the weekly assignments for the class you will get an A. There are NO tests or finals and he does take random attendance. Nice guy.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: You have an online website you use for all of your homework, there are 5 things due each week (an online site has to be purchased) and they can be tedious but that is your entire grade. I used in-class time to complete the homework or other work. Attendance is not mandatory but he uses it to bump. An easy A if you complete everything when due!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: Don't take this class unless you're a Geography major or like the subject. He's very passionate about it, but the class itself is boring b/c he basically reads the book to us every class. Everything is online; there are no tests. He takes attendance only one day a week, which is pointless, IMO. Overall, easy class, stupid attendance policy.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Took this class online as a gen ed requirement. The quizzes and test material are straight from the book and there's one discussion post due every month. You will only fail this class if you don't do the work. Easy A
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: I had Dr. McDaniel over the summer for GEOG 3380. He is very accommodating and offers many ways to understand the material. There was only one research paper, but it was interesting to write because we got to pick our own topics. I would take him again in a heartbeat!

He didnt really participate much in the class. He would grade things months after they were due. There was an outline for a research paper due in mid-February but we only got a grade on it like a month later, and no feedback to tell us if it was ok or not to use on the paper. Its easy but if you are looking for an engaging professor its not him.

McDaniel was a very nice professor but his lectures were unbelievable boring. He doesn't count attendance therefore half the class never showed up. All of his tests were online so you didn't really have to read the book though he expected us to.

I loved Professor McDaniel! I took him last spring semester for urban geography, and I learned a lot. Most of the test for online but read the textbook ahead for the test and pay attention to the PowerPoint's too. You can tell he's very passionate about his work. If you go to class, study the material for the test you'll get an A in his class :)
Dr. McDaniel is an excellent professor. All of his assignments are online, and his lectures are very informative. Take him!!

He is a good professor. His lectures can be pretty boring but the class is an easy A. He's always willing to help and explain things if you're confused about the assignment. I would definitely take him again.

Great professor, I would totally recommend him. If you are not into Georgraphy, his lectures are long and kind of boring, but all his work is online for the most part so it is worth it. He is very knowledgeable and shares his stories of the places he has been around the world which is pretty cool. But TAKE HIM!!! Great personality
Professor McDaniel is SO BORING. But his class is easy and all the tests/quizzes are online. He made us pay for an attendance account but he never took attendance.

Dr. McDaniel is a positive and encouraging professor. The class consists of a semester long process in writing a research proposal. The way he breaks down each section makes this class very doable. The only way you would not do well in this class is if you don't try at all.

Dr. McDaniel is an incredibly supportive, and accommodating professor. While the course itself may not be the most interesting, he certainly does his very best to break down and make it relate-able to the students. While the assignments do require a moderate amount of work, Dr. McDaniel provides great feedback. Would certainly take him again!
